name: fertilize
content:
fertilize verb [T]
(LAND)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to spread a natural or chemical substance on land or plants, in order to make the plants grow well

fertilize verb [T]
(EGG/SEED)
to cause an egg or seed to start to develop into a new young animal or plant by joining it with a male cell: Bees fertilize the flowers by bringing pollen. Once an egg is fertilized by the sperm, it becomes an embryo.

fertilize verb [T]
(SPREAD A SUBSTANCE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to spread a natural or chemical substance on land in order to make plants grow well: You have to fertilize your garden.
fertilize verb [T]
(JOIN CELLS)
biology (in plants and animals) to join male and female sexual cells so that young begin to develop
